website_summaries.verdict: While it's gained a lot of satisfied customers with its cooking abilities and good looks, others are either more affordable or have more features.
pros: A middle-of-the-road model that sports an attractive stainless steel finish
Holds a bird weighing up to 24 pounds
cons: A basic model that doesn't have any fancy features, but it works as promised

customer_reviews.title: Worked good the first time and then.......
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first time it was used on thanksgiving. But today when I went to use it a second time to roast another turkey it just won't come up to temp, it's been all the way up on 450 for more than 90 minutes and not even hitting 300 degrees.This is after preheating and roasting with the dial set to 325 for another hour and a half before realizing my thermometer was registering only about 190 degrees. So glad I used this again within the return period. Dont know what happened cause like I said it worked great the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Elwin Enfield

customer_reviews.title: Can't boil the water
customer_reviews.text: Well, the product came with a bad package and make me feel like it is a product returned from another customer. After 3 months of use of this Roaster Oven, I have to say that this is a good quality oven and I am using it for the restaurant every day, and everything works well. The size is good too. One thing that I have to mention is that this oven can't boil the water. I don't know it only happens in the oven that I have, or they don't expect the user to boil water in this oven.
customer_reviews.author: Zhipeng

customer_reviews.title: Happy With This
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this. Does a good job cooking a roast, is plenty big and easy enough to clean. Strongly recommend you use the rack on which the roast sits so you can get it in and out easily and safely.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Turkey Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Thanksgiving Day. Was pretty nervous using this for the first time, especially because I had a house full of guests coming over. But, happy to say, perfect 20 lb turkey! Very moist and cooked to perfection. It was done in about 3 hours. The oven was freed up for all the sides. Loved it! I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I'd wish it were better insulated as it's within hands reach for most and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have cooked an 18 lb turkey in here and have roasted spaghetti squash so far. Figuring out the timing vs conventional oven is a bit tricky, but it's all come out delicious. For a counter-top roaster, the outside gets really hot. I'd wish it were better insulated as it's within hands reach for most and that heat is capable of quite the scare.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: I had never used an electric roaster and about 5 years ago asked for one for Christmas. I loved it and when it broke, I found this one as a replacement. I probably use electric roasters in the summer more because it doesn’t heat up the house but all year long I love roasting turkey, chicken and baby back ribs the most. They are always moist and tender! I bought a digital thermometer that you poke into the meat and the internal temp is transmitted to a unit that sits on your counter. Best combo ever!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Works great. We always use roaster liners that I obtain ...
customer_reviews.text: use at church to prepare a meal of chicken and dumplings every month. Works great. We always use roaster liners that I obtain from amazon.com which makes cleanup SO EASY.
customer_reviews.author: C. KISER

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: It works well, happy with how the meals have come out. The pan comes out to clean very easy, but does not fit in my dishwasher so have to do it by hand. You can fill it up and then it gets heavy, and very hard to put the pan in full. No place for your fingers and the get pinched.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Rose

customer_reviews.title: MADE A BIG DIFFERENCE
customer_reviews.text: With the roaster oven it was easy to prepare all the other side dishes in the oven and had them all come out perfectly at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great extra oven!
customer_reviews.text: This "extra oven" works wonderfully! I put two casseroles in to heat and keep warm while the meat was in the big oven. Very handy and efficient for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Rabbitt

customer_reviews.title: Super oven
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Works great for our small kitchen. Big turkey wAs good. One needs to add liquid to pan for moister turkey
customer_reviews.author: Fran Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great roaster for meats
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job on thanksgiving turkey & left the oven free for sides. Great price & works well.
customer_reviews.author: AJB

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: In many ways, it is too big to easily clean up, but any smaller and it wouldn't work, so it threads a needle. Makes great soups and stocks and I can leave it go for hours unattended and not worry about burning down the house. It doesn't brown meats though, which is an issue. My biggest complaint is that it doesn't have an On Light or an Off setting. A fifteen cent LED indicator and an ability to have it plugged in but off would increase the value of this device immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A. Kugler

customer_reviews.title: Proctor Silex Roaster
customer_reviews.text: I like this roaster which you can take the pan out to wash it which is much easier. I made turkey and a few other items which I usually use the oven for. Everything got done faster than in the oven
customer_reviews.author: Kat L

customer_reviews.title: Great roaster for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great roaster for the money, cooked our Thanksgiving turkey in this one and turned out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it is well made and large enough to handle a good sized turkey
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet so I can't comment on how well it cooks , but it is well made and large enough to handle a good sized turkey.
customer_reviews.author: martie tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice roaster
customer_reviews.text: Cooks well. Meat is tender. Used it for a turkey and hams with good success. Can be a challenge to clean
customer_reviews.author: JackiR

customer_reviews.title: Used for Christmas ham
customer_reviews.text: Used to bake our Christmas ham. Will continue to do so in the years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Botleys3

customer_reviews.title: She looks great, a little smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: We haven't put this item up for a test drive!! heh, heh....She looks great, a little smaller than I thought....But that's okay.....It arrived early, which is Good.....We 're Happy!!!....Thanks...We'll put her to work this coming Thanksgiving Week. Good Job, Amazon and UPS !! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Given to my daughter as a gift and very well received.
customer_reviews.author: donald helton

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT Addition
customer_reviews.text: Yes...great addition to the cooking family. Can wait to make a big batch of Chili for Christmas. :)
customer_reviews.author: God's Child

customer_reviews.title: Make Sure Your Woring is Solid!
customer_reviews.text: This blew the breaker at my kids house halfway through the cooking on Thanksgiving Day and I didn’t know until an hour before lunch. Kind of was a disaster because we had to move everything back 2-3 hours and throw the bird in the oven old school. They live in a spec house with some cheap wiring so if your place is older or if you occasionally blow fuses with multiple appliances running simultaneously I would avoid this. The turkey was moister than usual so if your wiring is soild it’s probably a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: islandgma

customer_reviews.title: Not enough enamel.
customer_reviews.text: VERY POOR QUALITY on the insert- used it twice, washed and dried it thoroughly and it RUSTED. very disappointed. Paid $60.00 for JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Good Second "Oven"
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this primarily to supplement my entertaining projects as my stove has only one oven. This makes a perfect back up, you can use it for potatoes, stew and it's big enough for a large turkey, doesn't overheat the kitchen if you use it in the summer. The pull out pan makes for easy bird removable but a see through lid would be an improvement, taking the lid off an on to view progress wastes time and energy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot meal, cool kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Texas in summer! This roaster can cook a large ham and without heating up your kitchen. Attractive on your counter, easy to use and to clean. Excellent investment.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Annie

product_meta.title: Proctor Silex 32191 Roaster Oven, 18 qt, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Style Name:DiscontinuedWhether you're roasting a turkey, baking potatoes, or cooking a side dish, the Proctor Silex Roaster Oven will give you the extra cooking space you need when your main oven is busy. With an 18 quart capacity that's large enough to fit up to a 24 lb. turkey.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars102 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
